ing: 64 fluid ounces tomato and clam juice cocktail
3 pounds cooked shrimp, peeled and deveined
des: "This is an extremely tasty, refreshing cold soup that is wonderful on those hot, humid summer days... Did I mention that it's the easiest soup you'll ever make?  Wonderful with fresh garden vegetables and served with a nice, hearty bread."
ins:
In a large bowl, combine the tomato and clam juice cocktail, shrimp, avocados, cucumbers, tomatoes, red onion, cilantro, lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Refrigerate until ready to serve.
